title: Firebase Deploy
description: Ng Deploy target options for Firebase.

ssr.description: Should we attempt to deploy the function to Cloud Functions (true) / Cloud Run ('cloud-run') or just Hosting (false)

firebaseProject.description: The Firebase project name or project alias to use when deploying

functionName.description: The name of the Cloud Function or Cloud Run serviceId to deploy SSR to

functionsNodeVersion.description: Version of Node.js to run Cloud Functions / Run on

preview.description: Do not deploy the application, just set up the Firebase Function in the project output directory. Can be used for testing the Firebase Function with `firebase serve`.
